data.message: 19 till death row ,2cd got my back , grab my 9/11 gat, resurrected was 97 . how you doing slim herd about your fuckin  moms but she was Kardashian ay and I can't relate to  acid at young age at birth, didn't even know guess she just put it in our food... ain't that right, light drank like the new frank white.. pearly gates next to kim, ain't you slim, the god, the father how you do-in , am I suppose to know , just have to think um , nah I ain't dumb you is-lamb , all about the money , so I guess you could be a pagan in design , dragon police
